questions.question: What title did Abu Bakr earn because he believed the Prophet ﷺ immediately?

options: He declared if Muhammad ﷺ said it, it must be true

questions.question: Who did Abu Bakr help free from slavery and torture?
options: Bilal and other tortured Muslim slaves

questions.question: According to the Qur'an 92:17-18, who will be removed from Hellfire?
options: The righteous one who gives wealth to purify himself

questions.question: What happened when Umar first discovered his sister had accepted Islam?
options: He heard Qur'an recitation and his heart softened completely

questions.question: What changed for Muslims after Umar accepted Islam?
options: They could finally pray openly at the Ka'bah

options: He patrolled Madinah at night checking on the poor and carried flour for a widow

options: Strengthen Islam with either Abu Jahl or Umar ibn al-Khattab

questions.question: What title did Uthman earn and why?
options: The Generous One for his wealth
The Brave One for his fighting
Dhun-Nurayn (Possessor of Two Lights) for marrying two daughters of the Prophet ﷺ

questions.question: What did Uthman do for the Muslim army during the Tabuk expedition?
options: He provided one-third of the entire army's equipment and supplies
He stayed behind to protect Madinah
He negotiated peace with the enemy

questions.question: How did Uthman die as the third Caliph?
options: He was killed while reading Qur'an during his fast, with blood dripping on the pages

questions.question: According to Sahih Bukhari 3695, what did the Prophet ﷺ say about Uthman?
options: Nothing will harm Uthman after what he did today
Uthman will be the next leader

questions.question: How old was Ali when he accepted Islam?
options: Age ten, becoming the first young boy to believe

questions.question: What brave act did Ali perform on the night of Hijrah?
options: He fought all the assassins alone
He warned the Prophet ﷺ about danger
He slept in the Prophet's ﷺ bed while assassins surrounded the house
He led the Muslims to Madinah

questions.question: Who did Ali marry?
options: Fatimah, the Prophet's ﷺ beloved daughter

options: You are to me like Harun was to Musa, except there is no prophet after me

questions.question: What did Bilal repeatedly declare while being tortured in the desert sun?
Who purchased Bilal from his master and freed him?
What special role did the Prophet ﷺ choose Bilal for?
options: Islam's first muezzin, calling believers to prayer

questions.question: According to Sahih Bukhari 3697, what did the Prophet ﷺ say about Bilal?
options: I heard the sound of your footsteps in front of me in Paradise

questions.question: What was Salman searching for before he met the Prophet ﷺ?
options: Truth, traveling from monk to monk seeking knowledge

questions.question: How did Salman test if Muhammad ﷺ was the awaited prophet?
options: He offered food - the Prophet ﷺ refused charity but accepted gifts
He waited for a sign from heaven

questions.question: What brilliant military strategy did Salman suggest during the Battle of the Trench?
options: Digging a defensive trench around Madinah, a Persian strategy unknown to Arabs

questions.question: According to Sahih Muslim 2546, what did the Prophet ﷺ say about Salman?
options: Salman is from us, the People of the Household

options: Patience, O family of Yasir, for Paradise is your promised destination

options: Forced words under extreme torture don't nullify sincere belief in the heart

questions.question: How did Ammar die?
options: As a shaheed at the Battle of Siffin at age ninety-three

questions.question: What did the Prophet ﷺ say when companions laughed at Abdullah ibn Mas'ud's thin legs?
options: He agreed they were funny looking
Abdullah's legs would weigh heavier than Mount Uhud on Judgment Day

options: The Quraysh beat him severely for his bold recitation

questions.question: What special permission did the Prophet ﷺ give Abdullah?
options: To enter his private quarters anytime

questions.question: According to Sahih Bukhari 3760, what did the Prophet ﷺ recommend about Abdullah?
options: Learn the Qur'an from four, and he mentioned Abdullah ibn Mas'ud first

questions.question: Why was Abu Hurayrah often hungry?
options: He was very poor and sick
He chose knowledge over earning worldly provisions, staying constantly with the Prophet ﷺ
He gave all his food away

questions.question: What special supplication did the Prophet ﷺ make for Abu Hurayrah?
options: For his memory never to forget anything he learned

questions.question: How did Abu Hurayrah's household worship at night?
options: Abu Hurayrah worshipped, then woke his wife, then she woke their daughter until dawn

questions.question: Why is Abu Hurayrah so important to Muslims today?
options: He preserved over five thousand hadiths that benefit all Muslims

questions.question: Why was Hudhayfah called the Keeper of Secrets?
options: He knew where treasure was hidden
The Prophet ﷺ confided in him about future hypocrites in the community

questions.question: What did Hudhayfah do when his father was accidentally killed by Muslims at Uhud?
options: He immediately forgave them and asked Allah to forgive them, donating blood money to charity

options: Even Umar ibn al-Khattab asked this, showing Umar's humility

questions.question: According to Qur'an 4:142, what do hypocrites think they can do to Allah?
options: Deceive Him, but He is deceiving them

questions.question: What title did the Prophet ﷺ give to Khalid ibn al-Walid?
What was remarkable about Khalid's military career?
options: He won only a few battles
He never lost a single battle throughout his entire military career
He fought in only one battle

questions.question: What did Khalid do at the Battle of Mu'tah?
options: When three commanders died, he took command and saved the outnumbered Muslim army

questions.question: How did Khalid die and how did he feel about it?
options: He died peacefully in bed, which saddened him as he wished for martyrdom on the battlefield
He died in battle, fulfilling his wish

questions.question: What title did the Prophet ﷺ give Abu Ubaydah?
options: Amin al-Ummah (Trustworthy One of this nation)

questions.question: What sacrifice did Abu Ubaydah make at the Battle of Uhud for the Prophet ﷺ?
options: He removed metal rings from the Prophet's ﷺ helmet with his teeth, losing two front teeth
He carried the Prophet ﷺ to safety

questions.question: How did Abu Ubaydah show his humility?
options: He gave away all his wealth
When appointed as commander, he tried to decline and lived simply despite high rank

questions.question: How did Abu Ubaydah die?
options: He died in the plague as a shaheed, refusing to abandon his people

questions.question: What did Sa'd tell his mother when she vowed to starve until he renounced Islam?
options: He would leave Islam for her
Even if she had a hundred souls leaving one by one, he would never leave Islam

questions.question: What eternal principle did Allah reveal about Sa'd's situation with his mother?
options: Parents must be treated kindly but not obeyed in shirk or disbelief

questions.question: What special expression did the Prophet ﷺ make only for Sa'd during battles?
options: Shoot, Sa'd! May my father and mother be sacrificed for you!

questions.question: What major victory did Sa'd command?
options: The Battle of Qadisiyyah, which defeated the Persian Empire

questions.question: What selfless act did Talha do regarding the Battle of Badr?
options: He was absent but insisted on giving his share of spoils to those who fought

questions.question: How did Talha protect the Prophet ﷺ at the Battle of Uhud?
options: He shielded the Prophet ﷺ with his body, his hand becoming paralyzed from arrows

questions.question: According to Sahih Bukhari 3739, what did the Prophet ﷺ say about Talha?
options: Whoever wishes to see a martyr walking on earth, let him look at Talha

questions.question: What did Talha do when he received seventy thousand gold coins?
options: He couldn't sleep until he distributed every coin to the deserving

questions.question: How did Zubayr's uncle torture him to force him to renounce Islam?
options: By locking him in a room

questions.question: According to Sahih Bukhari 3719, what did the Prophet ﷺ say about disciples?
options: Every prophet has a disciple, and my disciple is Zubayr

questions.question: What showed Zubayr's continuous sacrifice throughout his life?
options: His body was covered with battle scars from every major battle

questions.question: Besides being a warrior, what else was Zubayr?
options: A successful merchant and farmer who earned wealth through honest work

questions.question: How old was Anas when he began serving the Prophet ﷺ?
What three blessings did the Prophet ﷺ pray for Anas?
options: Abundant wealth, many children, and long life

questions.question: Why is Anas important for understanding the Prophet's ﷺ daily life?
options: He narrated thousands of hadiths about the Prophet's ﷺ daily habits and character

questions.question: How did the Prophet ﷺ treat Anas during ten years of service?
options: He never scolded him or said 'Why did you do that?' even once

questions.question: How did Abdullah ibn Umar follow the Prophet's ﷺ example?
options: He meticulously followed every action, even copying where the Prophet ﷺ stopped during travels

questions.question: Despite his father being the powerful Caliph, what did Abdullah prefer?
options: Worship and teaching over authority and power

questions.question: What made Abdullah one of the major sources of Islamic knowledge?
options: He narrated thousands of hadiths with careful accuracy

questions.question: According to Sahih Bukhari 1122, what did the Prophet ﷺ say about Abdullah?
options: Abdullah is an excellent man; if only he would pray at night

questions.question: What did Umm Sulaym do when her husband refused Islam?
options: She divorced him for Allah's sake, showing faith comes before worldly relationships

questions.question: What was unique about Umm Sulaym's dowry when she married Abu Talhah?
What did Umm Sulaym do at the Battle of Uhud while pregnant?
options: She insisted on participating to carry water and help defend Muslims

questions.question: How did Umm Sulaym show incredible patience when her young son died?
options: She prepared the body, told no one, and waited for her husband using wisdom and patience

questions.question: What did Abu Darda give up when he accepted Islam?
options: His profitable trade business to dedicate himself to worship and knowledge

questions.question: According to Sahih Muslim 2448, what did the Prophet ﷺ say about Abu Darda?
options: Abu Darda is the wise one of this nation

questions.question: How did Abu Darda live despite opportunities for wealth?
options: He lived extremely simply, preferring spiritual richness over material comfort

questions.question: What did students do to learn from Abu Darda?
options: They traveled from distant lands to study under him in Damascus
They waited for him to travel

questions.question: How did the Prophet ﷺ choose Abu Ayyub's house when he arrived in Madinah?
options: He let his camel walk freely, saying it was commanded by Allah, and it stopped there

questions.question: What did Abu Ayyub and his wife do when they accidentally broke a water jug upstairs?
options: They used their only blanket to soak up water, fearing a drop might disturb the Prophet ﷺ

questions.question: How long did the Prophet ﷺ live in Abu Ayyub's home?
options: Seven months until the mosque and homes were built

questions.question: What showed Abu Ayyub's lifelong dedication even in old age?
options: He participated in the campaign to conquer Constantinople at age eighty

questions.question: Despite being very young, what did the Prophet ﷺ say about Mu'adh?
options: He was the most knowledgeable concerning halal and haram matters

questions.question: What methodology did the Prophet ﷺ teach Mu'adh for judging between people?
options: Use Qur'an first, then Sunnah, then ijtihad

questions.question: How did Mu'adh react when saying goodbye to the Prophet ﷺ before going to Yemen?
options: He walked alongside the Prophet's ﷺ animal not wanting to separate, and wept intensely

questions.question: According to the hadith, what will be Mu'adh's status on Judgment Day?
options: Scholars will be brought forward, and Mu'adh will be ahead of them by a stone's throw
At the back of the group

questions.question: What did Abd al-Rahman ask for when offered to share wealth and a wife?
options: He asked for half the wealth
He asked only to be shown the marketplace to earn his own living
He asked for a house instead

questions.question: What massive donation did Abd al-Rahman make to the Muslim army?
options: Seven hundred camels loaded with grain and supplies

questions.question: Why did Abd al-Rahman weep when eating fine food?
options: He remembered how the Prophet ﷺ and early companions suffered hunger

questions.question: According to Sahih Bukhari 3679, what guarantee was Abd al-Rahman given?
options: Abd al-Rahman ibn Awf is in Paradise

questions.question: What happened when Khalid ibn Sa'id's father discovered his faith?
options: He beat him severely and expelled him from the family home
He tried to convince him gently

questions.question: Where did Khalid migrate to escape persecution?
How did Khalid die?
options: He was martyred at the Battle of Marj al-Saffar fighting Byzantines

questions.question: According to Qur'an 3:169, what about those killed in Allah's cause?
options: They are alive with their Lord, receiving provision

questions.question: What special weapon did the Prophet ﷺ give Abu Dujanah at Uhud?
options: A sword with its right, after Abu Dujanah promised to use it until it bent

questions.question: What did Abu Dujanah wear only in battle?
options: A red headband that signaled extraordinary courage

questions.question: How did Abu Dujanah protect the Prophet ﷺ during Uhud?
options: He used his own body as a shield, with arrows striking his back repeatedly

questions.question: Where was Abu Dujanah eventually martyred?
options: At the Battle of Yamamah fighting false prophets

questions.question: How old was Usama when the Prophet ﷺ appointed him as military commander?
Who questioned Usama's appointment due to his youth?
options: Some senior companions like Abu Bakr and Umar were in his army

questions.question: What happened to Usama's father Zayd at the Battle of Mu'tah?
options: He was martyred while carrying the Muslim banner

questions.question: What does Usama's appointment teach about leadership in Islam?
options: Leadership is based on ability and wisdom, not age or seniority alone

questions.question: How old was Zayd ibn Thabit when the Prophet ﷺ migrated to Madinah?
options: Only eleven years old, too young to fight at Badr

questions.question: How quickly did Zayd learn Hebrew when asked by the Prophet ﷺ?
options: Just fifteen days, showing exceptional intelligence

questions.question: What critical task did Abu Bakr assign to Zayd after the Prophet's ﷺ death?
options: Collecting the Qur'an into one written volume

questions.question: According to Sahih Bukhari 3756, what was Zayd most knowledgeable about?
Who was Hafsa's father?
What tremendous responsibility was Hafsa given after the Prophet's ﷺ death?
options: The official written copy of the Qur'an was entrusted to her for safekeeping

questions.question: How long did Hafsa live after the Prophet's ﷺ death?
options: Thirty-four years, continuing to teach and guide Muslims

questions.question: According to Qur'an 33:6, what title do the Prophet's ﷺ wives have?
options: His wives are mothers to the believers

questions.question: What choice did Zayd ibn Harithah make when his father came to take him home?
options: He asked for time to decide
He chose to stay with Muhammad ﷺ rather than return to his biological family

questions.question: What unique honor does Zayd have in the Qur'an?
options: He is mentioned in many verses
He is the only companion named directly in the Qur'an
He is mentioned as a prophet

questions.question: How did the Prophet ﷺ describe his feelings toward Zayd?
options: Zayd was the most beloved person to him

questions.question: How did Zayd die?
options: He was martyred at the Battle of Mu'tah while carrying the Muslim banner

questions.question: Why did Abu Darda sell his beloved horse?
options: He didn't want anything to distract his heart from Allah

questions.question: What did Abu Darda say about sleep when his wife suggested he rest more?
options: The long sleep is ahead in the grave

questions.question: How did Abu Darda spend most nights according to his wife?
What did Abu Darda say when he was dying?
options: He smiled and said he was eager to meet Allah and see His generous rewards

questions.question: What relation was Jafar to the Prophet ﷺ?
options: His cousin and older brother of Ali ibn Abi Talib

questions.question: What did Jafar recite to the Abyssinian king to defend Islam?
options: Surah Maryam, describing how Islam honors Isa and Maryam

questions.question: How did the Prophet ﷺ react when Jafar returned from Abyssinia?
options: He was too busy to meet him
He kissed Jafar between his eyes and said he didn't know which brought more joy

questions.question: What special title did Jafar earn and why?
options: Jafar at-Tayyar (The Flier) because Allah gave him two wings to fly in Paradise

questions.question: What did Nusaybah do at the Battle of Uhud?
options: She defended the Prophet ﷺ with sword and bow, throwing herself between him and enemy swords

options: A deep shoulder wound that troubled her for the rest of her life

options: Her hand was cut off and she received eleven other wounds while fighting

options: Verses addressing both believing men and believing women equally

options: Islam's greatest enemy who led Quraysh in multiple battles

options: He declared whoever entered Abu Sufyan's house would be safe

options: He lost both eyes in battle, becoming completely blind while defending Islam

options: What has previously occurred will be forgiven for them
